new: Automatic Data Backup: Your focus stats, custom timers, and vibes now auto-sync to the cloud every 5 sessions
Data Recovery: Lost data can now be recovered from server backups when you log in
Admin Diagnostics: New monitoring system to detect and prevent data loss issues
improved: Report now shows your total hours when monthly breakdown is unavailable
Custom timers and vibes stay visible (but disabled) when logged out, just like Tasks
Better visual feedback with '(Sign up required)' labels on disabled features
fixed: CRITICAL: Fixed data loss issue affecting users who logged out between Jan 6-22. Users lost their focus stats, custom timers, vibes, and streaks due to a security fix that cleared localStorage without server backup. New auto-sync system prevents this from happening again.
Report now correctly displays all-time stats when daily data is missing
Custom timers and vibes now reload properly after logout

fixed: Improved reliability when switching between devices
